items.message: Enjoy a free glass of Prosecco when ordering a Pizza or Pasta in the Dining Room on check in during lunch (11:30am - 4pm) from Mon. - Fri.
items.title: Check-in Special

tips.text: Skip the pizza and go straight to the dessert. The best gelato in NYC! -Jacqueline Lombard, Top Chef

items.message: Free soda with any slice purchase when you check-in. Show check-in at the register.
items.title: Check-in Special

tips.text: The ultimate spot that marries artichoke dip with pizza to make one of the most savory slices around. Regulars call ahead for pick up to save themselves from the insanely long lines.

items.message: Get your Happy on! $2 Tiger Beers, $3 Small Plates, $4 Drafts, $5 Wine & $6 Sandwich Specials! Monday - Friday 4pm-7pm (view details)
items.title: Check-in Special

tips.text: This new location offers rice bowls and noodles, like the grilled pork steak noodle dish with chilled vermicelli, romaine, sprouts, herbs, eggs, fried shallots, crushed peanuts and house dressing.

items.message: Come in today and get a free sandwich on your first visit to Terri!
items.title: Newbie Special

items.message: Get any beverage (cold-pressed juices, smoothies, and shakes included) free with every 10th check in!
items.title: Loyalty Special

tips.text: The Buffalo "Chicken" Sandwich is addictive with a small kick from the hot sauce, just like they do in Buffalo! Vegan though, very much unlike Buffalo. Get your fake meat cravings satisfied here!

items.message: Get one free glass of sangria on your first check in!
items.finePrint: Valid Monday-Friday only (excludes Saturday and Sunday)
items.title: Newbie Special

tips.text: Go for weekend brunch - good eats and all you can drink sangria.

items.message: You're a regular, so here's a drink on the house. Your choice of a glass of wine or a beer. Thanks and we'll see you again soon.
items.finePrint: Just show this to your server or the manager, every time you unlock it, they know what to do.
items.title: Loyalty Special

tips.text: Enjoy a big portion of corned-beef hash with two well-poached eggs ($14) or a kale salad with clothbound cheddar ($11). The warm biscuits with jam are an excellent side ($3).

items.message: Check in during Restaurant Week (2/17-3/7) & receive a complimentary glass of sparkling wine upon next check-in. Redeem through Saturday, April 19. *Restaurant Week menus available at lunch & dinner
items.title: Loyalty Special

tips.text: Michelin-starred chef Daniel Boulud's downtown spot serves pork-belly-topped burgers and great sausages (try the blood and pig's head sausage) with an extensive beer list (24 on tap and 63 bottled).

items.message: Check in three times and get one free cookie. Please leave us a tip on Foursquare!
items.title: Loyalty Special

tips.text: Try the Mac and Chicharrón, a double dose of pork with a silky mix of American and cheddar cheeses, spiked with spicy sambal. It’s one of our #100best dishes and drinks of 2011.
Frank Bruni recommends the small flatbread pizzas in his New York Diet, in particular one that pairs "a bevy of caramelized onions and very nice Parmigiano Reggiano."
If your steak tartare tastes just a wee bit different than usual, thank Philippe Bertineau, the restaurant’s new head chef, who previously cooked at Payard.
